Reviews:
Sean Goh
Local Guide·1,261 reviews·6,124 photos
Rated 4.0 out of 5,
Recently bought a voucher from Fave for an hour of foot massage SGD$28.  Their published rate is SGD$35 for an hour of foot massage. The entire procedure was relatively easy, just call them to make a reservation.  Reached the shop and was directed to another shop on the same stretch, i assume both belong to the same owner. Paid another SGD$4 for an additional 15mins shoulder and back massage base on the receptionist ĺ

I was assigned to a male therapist which was skillful and utillize quite alot of strength. Ambience of the shop was quiet and dark.

Along the stretch, there are quite a few other massage shops and the rates are quite conpetitive.

Syafiqah Ismail
Local Guide·186 reviews·611 photos
Rated 3.0 out of 5,
I got the fave deal for an hour long foot reflexology, with an additional 15 mins of back massage. The place is not called silk massage spa but it is at no. 89 Jalan Sultan.

The foot massage was good but the back massage really hurt. My friend on the other hand enjoyed the back massage. We were even asked to lie down for the last part. Overall, I think the deal is worth it.

Jørgen van Elsäcker
Local Guide·19 reviews
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
I booked a 3-hour massage. I was very relaxing. The pressure of the masseuse was perfect for me. It was firm and gentle. She had a good feeling for my tension area. After the massage I felt light and energized.
The place is neath, room I had was quite and had a good atmosphere. After the treatment they serve tea with biscuits on the side. So for me the price quality ratio is perfect.

Alicia Gorzen
Local Guide·30 reviews·86 photos
Rated 2.0 out of 5,
I got my ears cleaned here, and then my husband and I got massages. The actual service was good, but masseurs were very rude. They spoke about us in Chinese, which SURPRISE! I speak Chinese. So I could understand them. I was going to say something, but honestly, I wanted to hear how much they would talk about us. My husband and I are a little overweight, but not very overweight. They laughed and joked that they needed bigger massage tables. They said my skin was too flabby, and therefore difficult to massage, and they continued to laugh. Even if I didn’t speak Chinese, I think it would have been pretty obvious that they were teasing us. Management should teach employees to be respectful.

Anit Arora
Local Guide·40 reviews·110 photos
Rated 1.0 out of 5,
It's looks fancy but it's not ,the masseuse doesn't understand English at all even the words like oil which the part of her daily thing.
AC doesn't work properly.
Full body oil massage means only back that too till waist, they don't even touch thigh and legs in full body massage.

Daria Danilina
11 reviews
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Wonderful place to get a massage for a fair price! Definitely do not share some of the sentiment expressed by others. This place is professional and very welcoming. Receptionist speaks good English.

Dain Sherborne
2 reviews
Rated 1.0 out of 5,
Had a 1hr body massage and it was pretty bad on many accounts. The massage itself was basically just the back and head and wasn’t very good, the massage table was uncomfortable, the masseuse was unfriendly, you can hear everything in the massage room next to you and the overall facilities are very basic

Khiang Seow
Local Guide·19 reviews·14 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Update: Back again and Shirley worked on my body and neck and it feels wonderful! I had the 90 mins massage and it felt like I had more than that! Shirley worked really hard, it felt like every muscle on my back was individually treated. I walked in with a stiff neck and walked out feeling new again.

Initially I thought I had the whole place to myself. It was quiet and peaceful. Towards the last 20 mins or so, others came for massage but one decided to take a phone call and the other was very chatty with his therapist. That burst my peaceful bubble.

2/2019 My traps were hurting bad and with just an hour to kill, i found silk massage nearby. Clean place with professional staff. Had the 60 mins session and focusing only on neck and shoulder. Shirley (Shui Li) was my therapist and she was great! In 1 hr, she eased my discomfort by rolling out the knots. I was in less pain for my activity that night. I went back again today for a second session with her and again I had immediate relief with just an hour. The relief has lasted 6 hours and I am keeping my fingers crossed that it will last a day or two. I recommend silk and Shirley if you are looking to feel good.

Naomi Gu

Came here with my dad to kill some time.
We both took the 90 mins package (30 mins foot massage + 60 mins body massage) for 70 dollar.
It was alright, i prefer the foot massage.
But my dad seemed to really enjoy it. I guess it really depends on your preference. The only thing i have to say though, the staff can't really speak english...
